name: The City In A Forest
description:
Puerto Princesa City, which forms part of the Philippine’s last frontier, is
 a City rich in natural resources and it is located in the western 
provincial island of Palawan, Philippines. Today, Puerto Princesa is a 
popular tourist city with many beach resorts
 and seafood restaurants. It has been acclaimed several times as the 
cleanest and greenest city in the Philippines. What are you waiting for 
come and experience the beauty within.
